text: Linxi an la suo ci de enhui de ren, jue buyao renwei tamen de linxi, duiyu tamen shi youyi de, qishi, na duiyu tamen shi youhai de; fuhuo ri, tamen suo linxi de (caichan), yao xiang yige xiangquan yiyang, tao zai tamen jingxiang shang. Tiandi jian de yichan, zhishi an la de. An la shi che zhi nimen de xingwei de
